programme.title: Trick or Treats for Kids
programme.desc: Whether you have kids or are a kid at heart, these whimsical Halloween treats are delicious, easy bakes. From leftover Halloween candy bark to ghosty treats and monster cakes. These recipes are perfect to make with little ones.

programme.title: Summer Bakes
programme.desc: Cue the fireworks, were celebrating the 4th of July and summer! Mia is bringing the treats perfect for your neighborhood block party or while grilling in the backyard. Ice cream sandwiches, grilled fruit cupcakes, and fun twists on old favorites!

programme.title: Side Hustles
programme.desc: From a lawyer to an actor to an insurance analyst, Stephanie discovers a world of folks whove turned their passion for cooking into side hustle food businesses. From dumplings, sushi and pretzels she explores how they balance their day jobs.

programme.title: Comfort Foods
programme.desc: Latin-inspired ice cream to Caribbean, Channa curry doubles to gourmet, deli sandwiches; Stephanie Izard shows what comfort food means to 3 very different cooks and learns how they turned their childhood memories into thriving food businesses.

programme.title: Smash Burgers And A Slice in Los Angeles
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza heads to all the buzzworthy spots in LA - cooking up calamari steak at a classic Mexican joint, tasting taro root donuts with fun flavors, grabbing a guanciale slice, and hopping on the line to make cheesy scrumptious smash burgers.

programme.title: Tacos, Brats, And Biscuits in Austin
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza goes down south to try Austins best bets - breakfast tacos are on the itinerary, as well as a bangin beer garden And sausage house, loaded biscuits, and dessert pancakes to boot! Austin may be weird but the food is fabulous.

programme.title: BBQ Bowls And Puffy Tacos in San Antonio
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza gets his spurs on to sample San Antonios best all-day brunch, taste some epic puffy tacos at a classic car joint, create colorful conchitas, and bask in the beauty of BBQ Thai curry bowls.

programme.title: Pierogies, Bagels, and Ramen in NYC
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza takes a LOT of bites out of the big apple as he samples warm pillowy bagels And schmear, grabs pierogies at an old school Ukrainian spot, gets the scoop on innovative ice cream flavors, and slurps up some real ramen.

programme.title: Pho, Poke, And Pig in Oahu
programme.desc: Frankie explores Hawaiis Oahu island to get nourished from fresh tuna poke, heartfelt Pho, and hand-pounded poi.

programme.title: Summer BBQ
programme.desc: Summer is coming to a close but theres still a bounty of fresh, seasonal produce to enjoy. Celebrate with Frankie as he makes some of his favorite cookout classics thatll take you from a weekend picnic to a backyard BBQ, with or without a grill.

programme.title: Bring Your Own Lunch
programme.desc: Frankie is all about BYOL - bring your own lunch. Its not only good for your wallet, its good for your health. Skip the vending machine and the cafeteria in favor of creative, cost effective and easy-to-transport midday meals.

programme.title: Salad Salad Salad
programme.desc: Amp up your salad game with a little mixing and matching, from light and leafy greens to crisp and hearty toppings, and dressings for all occasions. Frankie shows us how versatile and fulfilling a homemade salad can truly be.

programme.title: How Do You Like Them Apples
programme.desc: Apples arent just good for keeping the doctor away. Frankie demonstrates how to make the most of this beloved, everyday fruit, from sweet treats to savory meals. Theres a whole world of apples to dive into, especially while theyre in season.

programme.title: Super Squash
programme.desc: Never underestimate the power of squash: theyre affordable, abundant and they come in all shapes, sizes, colors, and textures. Frankie spotlights squash from summer through winter highlighting their amazing superhero traits.

programme.title: Spooktacular Tricks and Treats
programme.desc: Dont let the line of trick-or-treaters or the candy corn overload scare you out of the kitchen this Halloween. Frankies got tricks up his sleeve to make simple yet wicked good treats for everyone at the party to enjoy. All while saving some dough.

programme.title: Happy Halloween
programme.desc: Boo! Its spooky season, and what better way to get into the spirit than with affordable, party-friendly Halloween dishes that scream trick or treat?! But be warned, these meals are scary good.

programme.title: Spooky Halloween Party Bakes
programme.desc: Make your Halloween Party the talk of every boy and ghoul in the neighborhood! Whether its the poisoned apples, the drippy candle cakes, coffin pies or savory treats (or tricks) these delicious bakes will surely delight and scare.

programme.title: Hair-raising Halloween Cakes
programme.desc: Join Mia if you DARE for these Halloween cakes are sure to SCARE! Blood red velvet cake, marshmallow spiderwebs, bubbling caldrons and a cake that bites back will inspire some serious spooky vibes. Mia will seriously impress and teach you new skills

programme.title: Trick or Treats for Kids
programme.desc: Whether you have kids or are a kid at heart, these whimsical Halloween treats are delicious, easy bakes. From leftover Halloween candy bark to ghosty treats and monster cakes. These recipes are perfect to make with little ones.

programme.title: Hack Your Holidays
programme.desc: In this episode, you dont even need to turn on your oven! From a jaw-dropping cake hack, to fried biscuit donuts, you wont believe what you can do with pre-made desserts from the supermarket. Mia will show hacks and great tips for any home-baker!

programme.title: Bakes Around The World
programme.desc: Join Mia on a trip around the world without leaving the kitchen! From the Japanese Christmas Cake to Jewish Rugelach to German Pfeffernusse to Mexican Bunuelos. Your taste buds will get a tour with these holiday bakes from around the world.

programme.title: Bakes On A Budget
programme.desc: Money can be tight around the holidays. From the $3 cookies you will have to try to believe, to a show-stopping $25 trifle, Mia has got you covered - just because youre on a budget doesnt mean you have to skimp on style or taste!

programme.title: Eggscellent Techniques
programme.desc: In this special technique episode, Frankie teaches us several methods for cooking a quintessential ingredient: eggs. The scramble, the omelet, the Benedict learn to make them just the way you like them.

programme.title: Cabbage, cabbage, cabbage
programme.desc: Cabbage has long been an underrated green on the field, and its about time Frankie gives it a starring role. This leafy head proves itself as the versatile ingredient we need it to be, affordable year around, delicious and filling.

programme.title: 5-Ingredient Recipes
programme.desc: Who said struggle meals cant be delicious? Dont sleep on these 5-ingredient recipes simple weeknight meals that are anything but boring, and with a few pantry staples, youll have dinner on the table in no time.

programme.title: Sweater Weather
programme.desc: The air is crisp and the leaves are changing, which means its time to gather round the dinner table for hearty, seasonal meals on a budget. These warm dishes are sure to keep you cozy all season long.

programme.title: Moroccan Lamb with Sangria, Baby
programme.desc: Alex Hill welcomes the coziness of fall with some fabulous flavors And dishes including Moroccan lamb with dates And harissa, fall sangria with apples And amaretto, garlicky rice pilaf, roasted root vegetables, and crispy cucumber salad. Its fall yall!

programme.desc: Frankie Celenza explores the flavors of Chicago, sourcing the citys best ingredients from local farms and purveyors. Watch him cook all over town, from inside an Italian grocery store to nearby fields.

programme.desc: Andrew Gunadie aka Gunarolla heads to Southeast Asia for Luna New Year, and travel photographer Lily Rose checks in at a once-in-a-lifetime beach resort in Bora Bora.

programme.title: Julies Adventures in Mexico
programme.desc: Julie heads South of the border to face her fear of heights in Tulum, take in some waves in Ensenada, and participate in Da de los Muertos in Mexico City.

programme.title: Katie by Land, Sea, and Sky
programme.desc: Join Katie on the trip of a lifetime as she travels through Chiang Rai, Thailand, bounces over to Bali, and absorbs the sights of Sydney, Australia.

programme.title: Frankies Roamin Holiday
programme.desc: Frankie explores the historic cities of Bologna, Genoa and Rome while he stuffs his face Italian style.

programme.title: Northland of the Hornbills

programme.title: Negeri Yang Hilang Di Sarawak

programme.desc: Sebuah animasi yang memaparkan persahabatan seekor lebah bernama Buzz dan Amin. Mereka sering bersama dan kehadiran Buzz banyak membantu Amin jika menghadapi masalah.

programme.title: Tulis
programme.desc: Animasi bersiri yang membawa cerita kanak-kanak yang dapat memberi pengajaran dengan penggunaan watak-watak alat tulis seperti pensil, pembaris, pen, stapler dan sebagainya.

programme.title: Raja Pahat
programme.desc: Sebuah animasi yang mengisahkan Bajing, Tualang, Paruh dan Badik yang mahu bergelar Raja Pahat.

programme.title: Silang
programme.desc: Kisah Silang, seekor burung helang yang hidup bersama haiwan-haiwan di rimba setelah kematian ibu-bapanya.

programme.title: Ya Solihin
programme.desc: Mengisahkan seorang pemuda yang ditugaskan oleh seorang gurunya untuk menyampaikan hak dan kebenaran dalam agama Islam.

programme.title: Hot Chocolate And Tea Lady
programme.desc: Kali pertama bertemu, Adam Aiman menyangka Shaza Amira adalah Tea Lady baru di pejabatnya.

programme.title: Anak Bertuah
programme.desc: Embun bukan sahaja terpaksa berdepan dengan kerenah anak-anak sejak kecil hingga dewasa sebaliknya menerima hakikat dirinya sentiasa menjadi bahan hinaan dan cercaan ibu mentuanya, Tok Wan.

programme.title: Berita Mandarin
programme.desc: Ikuti berita berbahasa Mandarin yang memaparkan perkembangan politik, sosial, ekonomi, sukan, hiburan dan isu-isu semasa.

programme.title: WORLD TODAY
programme.desc: World Today, brings you the latest news of national interest and trending international issues.

programme.title: Cinta Dari Marikh
programme.desc: Aiman, bercita-cita menjadi pelakon aksi, dihantar ke kolej tentera oleh datuknya kerana sikap tidak berdisiplin. Sementara itu, Nova, makhluk dari Marikh, datang ke Bumi untuk mengkaji kehidupan manusia

programme.title: Meray Paas Tum Ho
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Danish, seorang lelaki penyayang dan setia yang hidup sederhana bersama isterinya Mehwish. Namun, kebahagiaan rumah tangga mereka musnah apabila Mehwish memilih kekayaan dan meninggalkan Danish

programme.title: Thideer
programme.desc: Mythilli, seorang wanita yang bekerja di Kuala Lumpur dalam perjalanan berjumpa teman lelakinya. Dia secara tidak sengaja menyaksikan satu pembunuhan ketika berhenti di sebuah lampu isyarat.

programme.title: Wounded Heart
programme.desc: Ferit, seorang jejaka dari keluarga kaya yang dihancurkan oleh pengkhianatan orang yang dipercayainya. Dalam usaha melupakan masa lalu, dia bertemu dengan Aye, seorang gadis yang ceria dan penuh semangat.

programme.title: Ray of Light
programme.desc: Mengisahkan seorang guru yang kembali mengajar di Sekolah Tinggi Qing Yun setelah perniagaan yang diusahakannya gagal. Di sana, beliau bertemu dengan seorang pelajar bernama Ren Zhen.

programme.title: Deadman
programme.desc: An ace in the barge business makes money by selling his name, is falsely accused of embezzling billions. He fights to reclaim his stolen life from those tied to him solely by name.

programme.title: The Unfair
programme.desc: A protest against urban renewal leads to death of a cop and a teen. The boys father was arrested for the cops death. A young attorney is assigned to defend the father.

programme.title: The Swindlers
programme.desc: Though each has their own motives, unlikely individuals from different sides of the law allies together to achieve a common goal - trapping the worlds most legendary con man.

programme.title: Exhuma
programme.desc: Exhuma follows two shamans, a feng shui expert and an undertaker as they seek to help a Korean-American family tormented by an ancestral curse.

programme.title: Gate
programme.desc: A group of five conspired for one last heist, yet secrets inside the vault are large enough to overthrow the country.

programme.title: 12.12: the Day
programme.desc: Based on the 12.12 Military Insurrection. Chun Doo-Gwang staged a coup. Lee Tae-Shin is a commander who fights against Chun. The chaos led Seoul to an unexpected direction.

programme.title: Ordinary People
programme.desc: When a high school gym teacher helps his student track down her missing friend, he finds himself faced with a conspiracy related to her disappearance.

programme.title: The Point Men
programme.desc: A diplomat and an National Intelligence Service agent headed to Afghanistan to save South Korean missionaries captured by Taliban. They only have 24 hours...

programme.title: Sisters on the Road
programme.desc: After her mothers death, Myung-eun meets her sister Myung-ju. They do not share the same father and decided to travel together to find Myung-euns father. A secret of her father reveals...

programme.title: Punch-drunk Love
programme.desc: Bok-seo gave up to be a soccer player after an injury. He meets Bok-hee and falls in love with her. Bok-hee feels unsure but she appreciates his sincerity, leading to something special...

programme.title: Peninsula
programme.desc: Set four years after the zombie outbreak, a former soldier and his team return to the zombie-infested wastelands to retrieve a truck of money and try to escape from it alive.

programme.title: Worst Woman
programme.desc: Eun-hee is an actress with poor acting and she acts in her life. She creates different characters when she dates a man. Eventually, her lies are tangled up and everything is messed up...

programme.title: Sisters on the Road
programme.desc: After her mothers death, Myung-eun meets her sister Myung-ju. They do not share the same father and decided to travel together to find Myung-euns father. A secret of her father reveals...

programme.title: The Spies
programme.desc: Kim, a North Korean spy who had lived in South Korea for 22 years is suddenly contacted by his superior. His team plans to complete an earlier mission and steal the targets large stockpile of cash.

programme.title: Ordinary Person
programme.desc: Sung-jin is a police officer involved in a conspiracy after he arrested a suspected murderer by chance. Gyu-nam make use of Sung-jins weakness, his family, to strike a deal with him.

programme.title: Smugglers
programme.desc: The haenyeos are having trouble with collecting seafood under water because of the newly built factory nearby. To make a living, they started doing smuggling business...

programme.title: Juror 8
programme.desc: Based on a true story, eight ordinary people of different backgrounds were selected as the first jury for a murder trial in South Korea in 2008.

programme.title: Punch-drunk Love
programme.desc: Bok-seo gave up to be a soccer player after an injury. He meets Bok-hee and falls in love with her. Bok-hee feels unsure but she appreciates his sincerity, leading to something special...

programme.title: The Point Men
programme.desc: A diplomat and an National Intelligence Service agent headed to Afghanistan to save South Korean missionaries captured by Taliban. They only have 24 hours...

programme.title: The Ghost Game
programme.desc: 6 students head to an underground reservoir and perform a necromancy ritual, but nothing seems to happen. Terror unfolds when the ritual becomes a deadly curse and threatens their lives...

programme.title: Decision to Leave
programme.desc: When detective Hae-Joon investigates the death of a man who fell from a mountaintop and meets his wife Seo-rae, he starts to suspect her at the same time that he begins feeling an attraction to her.

programme.title: The Priests
programme.desc: After a girl is assaulted, two priests must determine if she was attacked by an evil spirit or a molester.

programme.title: The Swindlers
programme.desc: Though each has their own motives, unlikely individuals from different sides of the law allies together to achieve a common goal - trapping the worlds most legendary con man.

programme.title: 6/45: Lucky Lotto
programme.desc: The excitement of winning a lottery ticket doesnt last long for sergeant Chun-woo as it accidentally ends up crossing the Military Demarcation Line. He must get his act together and find it again!

programme.title: 12.12: the Day
programme.desc: Based on the 12.12 Military Insurrection. Chun Doo-Gwang staged a coup. Lee Tae-Shin is a commander who fights against Chun. The chaos led Seoul to an unexpected direction.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E075
programme.desc: Nicols se siente avergonzado cuando Victoria le enumera todas las veces que ha credo en el a pesar de todo; sin embargo, esta vez, ella no est dispuesta a perdonarle tanta injusticia. Yosmir se niega a terminar su relacion con Eugenia por complacer a Yajaira. Florencia se impresiona cuando Nicols, aparte de revelarle que Leopoldo sigue con vida y fue Federico quien le disparo, termina su relacion con ella. La ilusion de Hansen de poder lograr que Adelaida corresponda a su amor aumenta cuando la mujer admite que est abriendose a la posibilidad de amarlo. Fernanda promete a Nicols que le va a devolver Cantarrana a los Guanipa siempre y cuando el se case con Florencia Guanipa esa misma semana.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E076 - Episodio 76
programme.desc: A Nicols le parece increble que Fernanda le este pidiendo que se case con Florencia a cambio de devolverle Cantarrana a los Guanipa; la seora le sugiere que aproveche la oportunidad porque, si no lo hace, se va a quedar sin Victoria y sin la ltima posibilidad de regresarle la felicidad. Hilario evidencia ante Florencia lo mal que est porque siente que no sabe querer a nadie; ella, por su parte, est destrozada por haber terminado con Nicols; por primera vez Guanipa admite no estar en capacidad de ofrecerle nada a la joven. Felipe le confa a Nicols que el querer ayudar a Antonieta a salir de su depresion solo ha empeorado las cosas porque ella se est ilusionando; Del Casal, por su parte, le revela a su amigo que va a casarse con Florencia porque esa es la nica manera de poder devolverle a Victoria un pedazo de la felicidad que el le quito.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E85
programme.desc: Max besa a Camila y le ruega que huyan juntos. Son sorprendidos por Ezequiel quien con odio pone un arma en la frente de su hijo, lo golpea. Fausto le da las ltimas instrucciones a Anton de eliminar a Ezequiel pero Torrealba llega. Culmina la boda. Se oye un disparo.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E86
programme.desc: Total caos en la iglesia despues del disparo. Max herido. Ezequiel, la toma del brazo y la aleja de all, aunque siente pesar por su hijo. Fausto y Roger son los protagonistas de este asesinato frustrado. Ezequiel y Camila se dicen crudas verdades.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E105
programme.desc: In tears, Illis assures Pastora that she only feels sorry for her; the enraged woman shoots in all directions.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E106
programme.desc: Baudilio, out of his mind, tries to hang Pastora while demanding that the woman confess to him if she murdered Misael.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E105
programme.desc: Alberto goes to see Claudio in his cell and complains about his cowardice, demanding to know who killed Marco Aurelio. Claudio insists that Lorena did it and Alberto presses him to tell him if there is someone else involved, but Claudio protects Gertrudis while denying that he was the one who fired the gun - Mara Lourdes offers Patricia as a last negotiation before going to a new trial, 12 years in prison for Malena and 6 years for Isabel - Lorena locates and meets Paco in a cafe in the city.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E81
programme.desc: Angustiados porque la polica no ha podido dar con el paradero de Azalea y la nia, Adriana y Cesar regresan a la casa Palacios, donde descubren que Carlos Ral los espera.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E82
programme.desc: Adriana logra llevarse a Tatianita mientras Carlos Ral queda enfrentndose a los delincuentes por defender a su madre.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E83
programme.desc: Carlos Ral acusa gran sorpresa cuando Ninoska se presenta ante el con un nio que asegura que es su hijo.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E076 - Episodio 76
programme.desc: A Nicols le parece increble que Fernanda le este pidiendo que se case con Florencia a cambio de devolverle Cantarrana a los Guanipa; la seora le sugiere que aproveche la oportunidad porque, si no lo hace, se va a quedar sin Victoria y sin la ltima posibilidad de regresarle la felicidad. Hilario evidencia ante Florencia lo mal que est porque siente que no sabe querer a nadie; ella, por su parte, est destrozada por haber terminado con Nicols; por primera vez Guanipa admite no estar en capacidad de ofrecerle nada a la joven. Felipe le confa a Nicols que el querer ayudar a Antonieta a salir de su depresion solo ha empeorado las cosas porque ella se est ilusionando; Del Casal, por su parte, le revela a su amigo que va a casarse con Florencia porque esa es la nica manera de poder devolverle a Victoria un pedazo de la felicidad que el le quito.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E077
programme.desc: Fernanda se complace cuando Florencia acepta ayudarla a continuar su guerra contra los Guanipa; la seora Alcoy asegura que juntas se van a encargar de poner las cosas en el lugar en que deben estar. La impresion se apodera de Florencia cuando Zambrano le revela que fue Rosendo Zapata, su padre, quien asesino a Jaimito Del Casal. Victoria asegura a Nicols que para ella es ms importante soar con regresar a Cantarrana que volver con el; el joven entiende su sentir y, antes de irse, la besa con desesperacion. Victoria le confa a Adelaida que siente la necesidad de odiar a Nicols para no dejar que su corazon vuelva a sentir la ilusion de que existe la posibilidad de una reconciliacion entre ellos.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E86
programme.desc: Total caos en la iglesia despues del disparo. Max herido. Ezequiel, la toma del brazo y la aleja de all, aunque siente pesar por su hijo. Fausto y Roger son los protagonistas de este asesinato frustrado. Ezequiel y Camila se dicen crudas verdades.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E87
programme.desc: Ezequiel reprocha a Camila querer fugarse con su hijo Max, ella lo niega. Pero el ya no le cree y duda de si debe o no ayudarla. Camila reacciona y le exige que cumpla con su palabra. La situacion de Max es estable pero delicada. Camila asiste al hospital donde Astrid trata de agredirla.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E106
programme.desc: Baudilio, out of his mind, tries to hang Pastora while demanding that the woman confess to him if she murdered Misael.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E107
programme.desc: In the clinic waiting room, Pastora pretends to worry about Baudilios health.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E106
programme.desc: Malena and Alfonso are ready to get married, and Alberto will be one of their witnesses. Unable to contain himself any longer, Ricardo interrupts the meeting between Don Lucio and Mara Bonita, wanting to know what they are discussing. Lorena confronts Norma, connects the dots, and realizes that she might be the key to uncovering Gertrudis.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E107
programme.desc: Gertrudis wants Malena to go to jail to teach her a lesson for defying her and to reiterate who holds the power, which is why she demands Mara Lourdes to continue the negotiation with Patricia; later, when she decides that the punishment has been enough, she will help her daughter to be set free.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E82
programme.desc: Adriana logra llevarse a Tatianita mientras Carlos Ral queda enfrentndose a los delincuentes por defender a su madre.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E84
programme.desc: Presionado por Matilde, Carlos Ral explica que, aunque piensa hacerse cargo de su hijo, no va a renunciar a su intencion de recuperar a Adriana.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E077
programme.desc: Fernanda se complace cuando Florencia acepta ayudarla a continuar su guerra contra los Guanipa; la seora Alcoy asegura que juntas se van a encargar de poner las cosas en el lugar en que deben estar. programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E078
programme.desc: Nicols y Florencia se besan con pasion cuando llegan Victoria y Carmencita a la mansion y los sorprenden en plena caricia. El hermoso momento que comparten Felipe y Clementina en el apartamento de playa de el se ve opacado cuando Antonieta insiste en llamar por telefono al joven y, como el no le contesta, opta por llamar al telefono celular de Clementina, quien se enfurece ante el descaro de la otra joven. Victoria interrumpe el beso entre Nicols y Florencia con aplausos antes de acusar al joven Del Casal de ser un hipocrita, pues hace apenas unas horas estaba tratando de besarla a ella; Florencia se niega a creerle. Hilario, con la astucia de la experiencia, sabe que Florencia se encuentra vulnerable ante el, por lo que le ofrece que lo escoja en vez de a Nicols; Guanipa se le va acercando a la muchacha hasta lograr que la joven acepte el beso que le da. Leopoldo celebra que Fernanda haya decidido regresar Cantarrana; la seora sabe que el no cree que ella sea capaz de cambiar para bien y que tarde o temprano se ir porque ya nada los puede salvar como pareja.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E87
programme.desc: Ezequiel reprocha a Camila querer fugarse con su hijo Max, ella lo niega. Pero el ya no le cree y duda de si debe o no ayudarla. Camila reacciona y le exige que cumpla con su palabra. La situacion de Max es estable pero delicada. Camila asiste al hospital donde Astrid trata de agredirla.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E88
programme.desc: Ezequiel accede a ayudarla a cambio de que lo de ellos sea un verdadero matrimonio y tengan un hijo. Camila ejecutar sus planes sin su ayuda y se marchar. Rosa Blanco le conto toda la verdad a la Madre Isabel. Decepcionada del matrimonio de su hija con uno de sus peores enemigos.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E107
programme.desc: In the clinic waiting room, Pastora pretends to worry about Baudilios health.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E108

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E108
programme.desc: Omar visits Lorena at the Coronas house and Alberto, blinded by jealousy, is furious to find them together - Malena, accompanied by Alfonso, arrives at the police station asking for detective Janet to turn herself in. After a few minutes, some officers bring Isabel. Great tension between the three involved in the supposed love triangle; while they look at each other, not daring to speak.

programme.desc: Ezequiel accede a ayudarla a cambio de que lo de ellos sea un verdadero matrimonio y tengan un hijo. Camila ejecutar sus planes sin su ayuda y se marchar. Rosa Blanco le conto toda la verdad a la Madre Isabel. Decepcionada del matrimonio de su hija con uno de sus peores enemigos.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E107
programme.desc: In the clinic waiting room, Pastora pretends to worry about Baudilios health.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E108
programme.desc: Israel proves the validity of the documents given to him by the journalist; Manuel Jess defends that he never stole any money

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E107
programme.desc: Gertrudis wants Malena to go to jail to teach her a lesson for defying her and to reiterate who holds the power, which is why she demands Mara Lourdes to continue the negotiation with Patricia; later, when she decides that the punishment has been enough, she will help her daughter to be set free.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E108
programme.desc: Omar visits Lorena at the Coronas house and Alberto, blinded by jealousy, is furious to find them together - Malena, accompanied by Alfonso, arrives at the police station asking for detective Janet to turn herself in. After a few minutes, some officers bring Isabel. Great tension between the three involved in the supposed love triangle; while they look at each other, not daring to speak.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E83
programme.desc: Carlos Ral acusa gran sorpresa cuando Ninoska se presenta ante el con un nio que asegura que es su hijo.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E84
programme.desc: Presionado por Matilde, Carlos Ral explica que, aunque piensa hacerse cargo de su hijo, no va a renunciar a su intencion de recuperar a Adriana.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E077
programme.desc: Fernanda se complace cuando Florencia acepta ayudarla a continuar su guerra contra los Guanipa; la seora Alcoy asegura que juntas se van a encargar de poner las cosas en el lugar en que deben estar. La impresion se apodera de Florencia cuando Zambrano le revela que fue Rosendo Zapata, su padre, quien asesino a Jaimito Del Casal. Victoria asegura a Nicols que para ella es ms importante soar con regresar a Cantarrana que volver con el; el joven entiende su sentir y, antes de irse, la besa con desesperacion. Victoria le confa a Adelaida que siente la necesidad de odiar a Nicols para no dejar que su corazon vuelva a sentir la ilusion de que existe la posibilidad de una reconciliacion entre ellos.

programme.title: Dropped - S05:E11 - After the Drop
programme.desc: Chris and Casey Keefer recount their most memorable moments from this years journey to Alaskas Brooks Range.

programme.title: Dropped - S05:E12 - The Keefer Brothers
programme.desc: The Keefer brothers look back on one of their favorite moments of this years adventure.

programme.title: Wardens - S02:E10 - Operation Big Horn
programme.desc: Have you ever been curious about what happens to seized trophy animals? Well show you today. Join game wardens as they keep an eye on hunting activities involving big horn sheep. Flathead Lake is bursting with festive vibes during the 4th of July. Lets make sure it stays safe.

programme.title: Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots - S01:E01 - Meet Island Air
programme.desc: Thousands of outdoor adventure seekers flock to Kodiak Island to experience the wilds of Alaska through hunting, fishing and wildlife viewing expeditions, and Island Air Service makes those once-in-a-lifetime quests a reality. Flying in fog, rain, snow or sleet and moving outdoorsmen, locals, supplies and materials to the farthest corners of the island, Its all in a days run for a Kodiak bush pilot and the staff and crew of Island Air.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle - S01:E02 - Introduction to Police Special Operations
programme.desc: As warfare has evolved, many military techniques and technologies have been adapted for use in urban settings by police units around the world. This episode provides viewers with an intimate perspective on what it feels like to be "inside the heads" of special police personnel, and how their use of military-style strategies and equipment allows them to save lives. From riot control in South Africa and the lessons learned from its excesses, to Los Angeles Police Chief Robert Gates creation of an elite police S.W.A.T team, CQB will showcase how, over the past 30 years, the fight against urban crime has evolved into a military scenario, with both sides using increasingly complex weaponry and tactics.

programme.title: Carters W.A.R. - S02:E02 - The Heart of the Conflict
programme.desc: Investigating a string of murdered lions, Ivan gets to the very heart of an ancient conflict between humans and lions. The outcome will test Ivans own core values about cultural

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E25 - Kate The Making Of A Modern Queen
programme.desc: A look at the Duchess of Cambridges journey from being an everyday young woman to becoming a future queen, and what her evolution signifies for the royal family.

programme.title: Diana: In Search of Happiness
programme.desc: Experience an in-depth look at Princess Diana, the extraordinary woman of the 20th century. Featuring unique interviews and touching clips, this portrait captures her incredible journey to fame and her ability to overcome the emotional and physical challenges she encountered nearly every day.

programme.title: Dropped - S06:E01 - Into the Unknown
programme.desc: In the season premiere, brothers Chris and Casey Keefer are dropped in the wilderness of New Zealand with virtually nothing. They must quickly adapt to their new environment or face life threatening consequences.

programme.title: Dropped - S06:E02 - White Water
programme.desc: The adrenaline has worn off for Chris and Casey, and the jet lag has set in. The brothers face frigid temperatures and unpredictable whitewater rapids. When they try to navigate the rough waterways, their safety is threatened.

programme.title: Wardens - S02:E11 - Operation Rogers Pass
programme.desc: Montana Game Warden Bryan Golie lends a hand to a hunter who gets hurt out in the woods. Meanwhile, other wardens track down some hunters who try to skip the check station, leading to unexpected outcomes.

programme.title: Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots - S01:E02 - Fight or Flight
programme.desc: While on a routine sightseeing flight, a massive storm has the pilots fighting to keep their passengers safe.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle - S01:E03 - Russian Army in Chechnya
programme.desc: After the fall of the soviet union many countries remained in dispute in the early nineties despite eastern Europes independence. In 1994 a bitter conflict broke out between the forces of the Chechen independence movement and the Russian regular army. Despite overwhelming manpower, weaponry and air support, the Russian forces were unable to establish effective permanent control over the mountainous area due to many successful Chechen guerrilla raids. Improvised Explosive Devices were one of the most effective methods employed in these disastrous raids and were the back drop to many Close Quarter Battle scenarios exchanged between the two sides.

programme.desc: When Jade finds out about her mothers financial problems, she joins her crush in a series of high-profile burglaries to pay off her mothers debts.

programme.title: Catfish Murder
programme.desc: Doing her best to balance a successful career with family life, a single moms world spirals out of control when her shy teenage son is arrested for the murder of a young woman from the same high school.

programme.title: Meet me in New York
programme.desc: Ambitious New York events planner Kelly is one of the best in the business. But when Joe, a stubborn, but influential website editor, hires her to organize his nieces birthday, Kelly soon realizes that she may have met her match.

programme.title: The Marry Me Pact
programme.desc: Charlotte and Rory are best friends, and for his 30th he goes travelling around the world. A year later, Charlotte visits a psychic who tells her she is destined to be with Rory when he gets home. Rory comes home...but engaged.

programme.title: The Love Hunt
programme.desc: A high-powered real estate executive returns home after her dad passes, the only way shell inherit his estate is if she finds the only treasure that ever eluded him.

programme.desc: Jenna is a fashion designer who works for her friends boutique. Their failing business was saved by a famous influencer. When Jenna comes to a lavish Hamptons wedding, she was mistaken for her, but she decides to go along to save business

programme.title: The Love Hunt
programme.desc: A high-powered real estate executive returns home after her dad passes, the only way shell inherit his estate is if she finds the only treasure that ever eluded him.

programme.title: Sparks Over Brooklyn
programme.desc: Single mom and chef Lidia sees her dreams for the future falling apart when arrogant tech innovator Danny buys her beloved family restaurant with plans to turn it into a busy dining experience.

programme.title: Dare to Say Yes
programme.desc: Michelle is having the worst day - she gets fired and dumped on the very same day. Best friend Sara persuades her to come along to a new retreat which offers a wellness and empowering program called Just Say Yes.

programme.title: The Soulmate Search
programme.desc: When Lindsay gets the chance to sign up to the notoriously exclusive dating service Eternity, she clashes with Will, her first date. They mutually agree this dating service has been a complete bust and make a deal to get their money back.

programme.title: Secret Lives of College Escorts
programme.desc: Eve and her friend sneak out for a party, but her friend winds up dead and Eve loses her college scholarship. Soon she finds a job to pay for tuition but her job was a front for the dangerous sugaring scheme that caused her friends death.

programme.title: InstaFame
programme.desc: Since her divorce, Gwen and her teenage daughter Maddie make a great team and tell each other everything. Its Maddies senior year and shes excited to be reunited with her besties Kelly and Lacey again. Eager to be the coolest girls at school, the perfect way to gain instant popularity is posting selfies! When one of their social media stunts goes wrong, Maddie is blamed and the consequences are deadly. But Gwen knows shes innocent. Shes determined to prove it and to protect her daughter from the real killer
